message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product is not just an item; it's a solution tailored to enhance your experience. Considering its unique features and the quality craftsmanship involved, I propose a price of $15000 for this exceptional product.

Thank you for the proposal, Alice. While I appreciate the quality and design of your product, my budget allows me to spend no more than $10000 on this purchase. I hope we can come to an agreement that respects both the value of your product and my financial constraints.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints and respect your decision. I would like to propose a compromise that might work for both of us. I am willing to offer the product at a price of $12500. This price reflects the value of the product while remaining within your budget considerations. I believe this could be a mutually beneficial solution.
